respStmt.resp: Wrote the scripts permitting (1) the automatic download of images, (2) automatic transcription by PyTesseract, (3) assisted structuration of the transcription in TEI and (5) deduction of the text's keywords.
respStmt.orgName: Axe de Recherche en Histoire Numérique, in Laboratoire de Recherche Historique Rhône-Alpes (UMR 5190), Lyon, France
École Normale Supérieure de Lyon, France

respStmt.resp: Wrote HT_CRISCO the scripts permitting (4) the linguistic analysis of the text: lemmas, part-of-speech and syntactic enrichment.
respStmt.orgName: Centre de Recherche Interlangues sur la Signification en COntexte (UR 4255), Université de Caen Normandie, France
